data.lyric:
[ti:Too Much To Ask]
[ar:Niall Horan]
[al:Too Much To Ask]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Too Much To Ask - Niall Horan (奈尔·霍兰)
[00:01.88]Lyrics by：Niall Horan/Jamie Scott
[00:03.77]Composed by：Niall Horan/Jamie Scott
[00:05.66]Produced by：Greg Kurstin
[00:07.55]Waiting here for someone
[00:10.04]
[00:13.58]Only yesterday we were on the run
[00:16.44]
[00:19.78]You smile back at me and your face lit up the sun
[00:23.91]
[00:24.84]Now I'm waiting here for someone
[00:28.92]
[00:31.80]And oh love do you feel this rough
[00:37.33]
[00:38.41]Why's it only you I'm thinking of
[00:41.64]
[00:44.72]My shadow's dancing
[00:46.97]
[00:47.73]Without you for the first time
[00:50.29]
[00:50.91]My heart is hoping
[00:53.30]
[00:53.92]You'll walk right in tonight
[00:56.61]Tell me there are things that you regret
[00:58.95]
[00:59.64]'Cause if I'm being honest I ain't over you yet
[01:03.34]It's all I'm asking
[01:05.72]
[01:06.37]Is it too much to ask
[01:09.13]
[01:12.64]Is it too much to ask
[01:15.41]
[01:22.26]Someone's moving outside
[01:25.73]
[01:28.35]The lights come on and down the drive
[01:31.62]
[01:34.46]I forget you're not here when I close my eyes
[01:38.69]
[01:40.69]Do you still think of me sometimes
[01:44.61]
[01:46.62]And oh love watch the sun coming up
[01:52.25]
[01:52.94]Don't it feel messed up we're not in love
[01:56.64]
[01:59.58]My shadow's dancing
[02:01.80]

[02:04.94]
